attributes.review:
Do. Not. Get. This. App. It is so unhelpful and honestly just a waste of time. A friend recommended it to me and I was rather excited to have an outlet to support this "great man". Overall disappointed with the performance of the app. Runs at like -1 fps at best. 
Don't get this app, and waste your time with literally anything else.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to try and keep up with my presidents campaign and when I downloaded this app my phone started acting up and dying at 77% and my phone kept glitching and just my whole phone turned upside down. So I have now deleted the app and my phone is now normal. I HIGHLY DONT recommend this app.
attributes.title: NOT A GOOD APP.

attributes.review: I would rate this zero stars if I could. As soon as I opened the app my phone reset and then when I turned it back on it started playing the Russian national anthem on Apple Music?? And then on top of that…my home screen was changed to Melania Trump. This app is a huge scam!! Don’t download. 🤦‍♀️
attributes.title: The worst app I’ve ever downloaded!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about how our lovely ✨orange✨ is running our country into the ground 🤗. I just love 🇺🇸America🇺🇸 so much!! We are such an amazing country with all this racism and murder 😎. Love to see it! But honestly this app just wasn’t what I was looking for. Whoops ☺️. Not worth the time not worth the energy 🤭💗🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: our wonderful 🧚🏼‍♀️✨orange✨🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: This is the worst app EVER IN HISTORY first of all this app got my hopes up because it I was looking forward to contacting him and it’s absolutely useless don’t get this app it’s a mistake you still might get it but you will definitely regret it totally not going to wast my storage on this app it’s useless and dumb don’t get it ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS
attributes.title: For Tiktok

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what trump has planned. Within three minutes of being in the app, it crashed. I tried to get back on but it kept crashing. How does a Trump want to make America great again if he cannot get right people to work on his app?!
attributes.title: Disappointment

attributes.review: When I opened the app, the walls started melting and my dogs started throwing up and my cats started howling I got an instant migraine my skin turned bright orange and my phone imploded and then I got diarrhea and because everything was melting i didn’t have any toilet paper so I was forced to use my favorite pair of chonies. I do not recommend.
attributes.title: Nope

attributes.review: I was enjoying this app until it had a pop up advertisement telling you to kill your family. I was very disturbed but what was even worse was that my six year old sister was looking at my phone at that time. She is traumatized. Do not download.
attributes.title: So disturbing and horrible

attributes.review: This app is horrible. Every time i opened it, it made my phone crash and i just wanted to know what trump is doing now😔. I don’t think you can update it enough to fix all the bugs apple should just remove it from the app store
attributes.title: the app kept crashing my phone 🥵🍪🙈
